Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to troubleshoot Copilot in cloud flows designer in Power Automate. This feature will reach general availability on June 1, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature helps to rectify errors in your cloud flow. These corrections are based on issues that arise during authoring and debugging and can be implemented to amend your flow within the Power Automate designer. Users can choose to accept the changes or revert to the original and modify the flow as desired.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

For more information on this feature, please visit the Troubleshoot Copilot in cloud flows designer article.

Title: Power Automate â€“ Troubleshoot Copilot in cloud flows designer feature
